entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one whose schedule has been messed up. She is described as being good and capable of managing her schedule.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is concerned about Hermione's schedule and tries to help her fix it.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the one with whom Hermione has fixed her schedule.

relationships.description: Hermione has helped by fixing her schedule with Professor McGonagall.
Ron is concerned for Hermione's schedule and tries to help her fix it.
